info.title: WIEDPUG API
info.description: API Documentation for the WIEDPUG Network

post.description: Sent by an organisation that has already requested a test by paper to the Test House, as a verification of the paper request

type.description:
A URI reference [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type.
This specification encourages that, when dereferenced, it provide human-readable documentation for the problem type (e.g., using HTML [W3C.REC-html5-20141028]). 
When this member is not present, its value is assumed to be "about:blank".      
e.g. For 400 Bad Request, the "type" value can be "https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc9110#section-15.5.1"

title.description:
A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. 
It SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization(e.g., using proactive content negotiation; see[RFC7231], Section 3.4).
e.g. "One or more validation errors occurred."

status.description: The HTTP status code ([RFC7231], Section 6) generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem. e.g. 400, 403, or business relared problem etc.

ApiErrorResult.description: A machine-readable format for specifying errors in HTTP API responses based on https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7807.

data.description: Contains response data. e.g. Auction Catalogue

ApiResult.description: A standard API response object used for all successful API responses

propertyIdentificationCodes.description:
Property Identification Code - the property code to identify the source of the wool.
This field is not used in New Zealand transmission.
For TRV only

showBaleIndicator.description: Property for Greasy/Processed bale detail, not necessary for other types of bale details.

baleRenumber.description: Property for Renumber BaleDetail, not necessary for other types of bale details.

unitNumber.description: Property for Tripacks BaleDetail, not necessary for other types of bale details.

BaleDetailType.description:
Renumbers: Bale Details - Renumbers
GreasyOrProcessed: Bale Details - GreasyOrProcessed
Tripacks: Bale Details - Tripacks

Centre.description:
Centre has country and centreCode.
The centreCode is one of these below based on the value of country. 
The mapping of country: centreCode is the following:
            
AU:CentreCodeAustralia

NZ: CentreNewZealand

FR: CentreFrance

ZA: CentreSouthAfrica

BE: CentreBelgium

GB: CentreUnitedKingdomofGreatBritain

DE: CentreGermany

IT: CentreItaly

NL: CentreNetherlands

CN: CentreChina

TW: CentreTaiwan

US: CentreUSA

CentreCodeAustralia.description:
This is Centres for Australia. A centre is a town where any activity connected with the wool industry takes place. The codes used in transmissions are those defined in the Australian Wool Selling Regulation.

micronMin.description: Minimum micron, optional decimal with one digit precision.

micronMax.description: Maximum micron, optional decimal with one digit precision.

colourYZMin.description: Minimum colour Y-Z, optional decimal with one digit precision.

colourYZMax.description: Maximum colour Y-Z, optional decimal with one digit precision.

vmbMin.description: Minimum VMB, optional decimal with two digits precision.

vmbMax.description: Maximum VMB, optional decimal with two digits precision.

woolBaseMin.description: Minimum wool base, optional decimal with two digits precision.

woolBaseMax.description: Maximum wool base, optional decimal with two digits precision.

dichloromethaneDryBasisMin.description: Minimum dichloromethane on a dry basis, optional decimal with two digits precision.

dichloromethaneDryBasisMax.description: Maximum dichloromethane on a dry basis, optional decimal with two digits precision.

lacBarbeMin.description: Minimum LAC Barbe, optional numeric field.

lacBarbeMax.description: Maximum LAC Barbe, optional numeric field.

lacHauteurMin.description: Minimum LAC Hauteur, optional numeric field.

lacHauteurMax.description: Maximum LAC Hauteur, optional numeric field.

lacHauteurUnder20Min.description: Minimum LAC Hauteur under 20, optional numeric field.

lacHauteurUnder20Max.description: Maximum LAC Hauteur under 20, optional numeric field.

lacHauteurUnder40Min.description: Minimum LAC Hauteur under 40, optional numeric field.

lacHauteurUnder40Max.description: Maximum LAC Hauteur under 40, optional numeric field.

lacHauteurCVPercentMin.description: Minimum LAC Hauteur CV(%), optional numeric field.

lacHauteurCVPercentMax.description: Maximum LAC Hauteur CV(%), optional numeric field.

CountryCode.description:
A code for the country in which the transmission was created. Country Code using ISO 3166-1 standard
AU: Australia
NZ: New Zealand
FR: France
ZA: South Africa
BE: Belgium
GB: United Kingdom of Great Britain
DE: Germany
IT: Italy
NL: Netherlands
CN: China
TW: Taiwan
US: USA

errors.description: Dictionary of errors in <PropertyName, ErrorDetails[]> format. e.g. errors: { "name": ["Product name is required"], "category": ["Category name cannot be longer than 20 characters."]  }

DarkAndMedullatedFibreRiskBroker.description:
1: Risk Level 1 (lowest)
2: Risk Level 2
3: Risk Level 3
4: Risk Level 4
5: Risk Level 5
6: Risk Level 6

DeclaredBreed.description:
A: Australian Superfine
M: Merino
X: Crossbred
D: Downs
T: Carpet
R: Sheds Fibres

D: Mud
V: Skin pieces
P: Shanks
Y: Black & Grey
F: Soft Cotts
U: Sweat/Frib

0: No scale/qualifier code is T
1: Light/Odd
2: Medium
3: Heavy/Line of…

DeclaredWoolCategory.description:
F: Fleece
P: Pieces
B: Bellies
C: Crutchings
Z: Locks

DeclaredWoolSubCategory.description:
W: Combing Weaners & Lambs
L: Carding Lambs
U: Plucked & Dead
K: Shorn from Skins
G: Fellmongered
O: Overgrown
N: Non-conforming lot
T: Not required

ErrorCode.description:
A code to indicate the different types of errors.
DOXCT: Document originator does not match current transmitter.
INVTC: Invalid transfer config. All data rejected.
INVFR: Invalid/missing FinalReceiverList record. All data rejected.
INVAC: Invalid sale aann/nn dd/mm/yy ooooo. All data rejected.
INVCR: Current receiver not awtm. All data rejected.
INVDO: Invalid document originator code aaaaa. Data accepted.
INVSO: Warning! Invalid selling org AAAAA using doc orig AAAAA.
INVEX: Invalid excluded record.

InformationCode.description:
A code to indicate the information.
OK: All data received OK.

Laboratory.description:
The code for a Test House.
1: Australian Wool Testing Authority
2: N.Z. Wool Testing Authority
3: N.Z. Wool Testing Service
4: South African Wool Testing Authority

LotType.description:
A code used to describe wool lot preparation. It is not wool type. `*` wool meets clip preparation guidelines.`#` wool does not necessarily meet clip preparation guidelines
1: (Suffix - P) Classed Grower Lot *
2: (Suffix - M) Objectively Matched Lot
3: (Suffix - J) Combined Certificate
4: (Suffix - I) Subjectively Matched Interlot
5: (Suffix - B) Other Bulk Class Lot #
6: Not Used
7: (Suffix - N) Objectively Matched Interlot
8: (Suffix - Q) Classed Bulk Class Lot – Quality Managed *
9: (Suffix - D) Other Grower Lot #

MulesingStatus.description:
NM: Non Mulesed
LN: Liquid Nitrogen
CM: Ceased Mulesing
AA: Mulesed with Analgesic &/or Anaesthetic
M: Mulesed
ND: Not Declared

saleDateRequested.description: Date value in ISO 8601 standard. e.g. 2024-03-21

startDateTimeStatusRequest.description: Date and Time value in ISO 8601 standard UTC format. e.g. 2024-03-21T19:25:04Z

endDateTimeStatusRequest.description: Date and Time with offset value in ISO 8601 standard UTC format. e.g. 2024-03-21T19:25:04Z

isUsingNetworkDateTime.description:
A boolean value to indicate whethear to use network datetime.
true: use network datetime.
false: not use.

RequestTypeForData.description:
1: Private Data Request
3: Data Re-Request
4: Broadcast Data Request

NZ_C: Christchurch
NZ_N: Napier
AU_A: Adelaide
AU_AU: Australia
AU_B: Brisbane
AU_F: Fremantle
AU_G: Geelong
AU_L: Launceston
AU_M: Melbourne
AU_N: Newcastle
AU_R: Goulburn
AU_S: Sydney
PS: Private Sales
T: Auctions Plus Sales

SoftwareCompany.description:
1: Talman
2: Symbotic
3: Jumbuck/Datacon
4: Jemalong
5: NA - no value
6: Modiano
7: AWH
6: AWTA

SourceCode.description:
Source of the lot presented for sale.
1: Grower
2: Dealer
3: BulkClass

isCompanyABNApplicable.description:
A boolean value to indicate whether the Company ABN is applicable to invoice. 
true: applicable.
false: not applicable.

growerCode.description: Optional alphanumeric field for grower code.

growerName.description: Optional alphanumeric field for grower name.

coreTestSamplingDate.description: Optional date field for core test sampling.

coresPerBale.description: Optional numeric field for cores per bale.

grabsPerBale.description: Optional numeric field for grabs per bale.

isPreviousDataToBeUpdated.description:
A boolean value to indicate whether data sent on a previous transmission is to be updated by data in the current transmission.
true: Update previous data.
false: Do not update previous data.

hashTotal.description: Required numeric field for hash total.

isYieldAndMicronTestRequired.description:
A boolean value to indicates whether Yield and Airflow Test is required until 30/06/2000.
true: required.
false: not required.

isLengthAndStrengthTestRequired.description:
A boolean value to indicates whether Length And Strength Test is required.
true: required.
false: not required.

isLengthOnlyTestRequired.description:
A boolean value to indicates whether Length Only Test is required.
true: required.
false: not required.

isColourTestRequired.description:
A boolean value to indicates whether Colour Test is required.
true: required.
false: not required.

isLaserscanTestRequired.description:
A boolean value to indicates whether Laserscan Test is required.
true: required.
false: not required.

isAirflowTestRequired.description:
A boolean value to indicates whether Airflow Test is required.
true: required.
false: not required.

isOFDATestRequired.description:
A boolean value to indicates whether OFDA Test is required.
true: required.
false: not required.

isDarkAndMedullatedFibreTestRequired.description:
A boolean value to indicates whether Dark And Medullated Fibre Test is required.
true: required.
false: not required.

isPesticideResidueTestRequired.description:
A boolean value to indicates whether Pesticide Residue Test is required.
true: required.
false: not required.

isContactingWithExoticBreeds.description:
A boolean value to indicate whether it contact with exotic breeds. 
true: contact with exofic breeds.
false: not contact with exofic breeds.

isCrutched.description:
A boolean value to indicate whether it is crutched. 
true: crutched.
false: not crutched.

isCrutchedWithin3MonthsOfShearing.description:
A boolean value to indicate whether crutching within 3 months of shearing.
true: crrutched.
false: not crutched.

ageFrom.description: Required numeric field for minimum age.

ageTo.description: Optional numeric field for maximum age.

TestRequestsVerificationApiResult.description: A standard API response object used for all successful API responses

TransferConfig.description:
Used to identify document transfer type: Restrict, Unrestric, and Exlcude.
Only used for data retrieval. Do not include it in the response.

TransferType.description:
Unrestrict: Send document to all members
Restrict: Send document to appointed members
Exclude: Send to all members excluding the appointed members

dateFormatLastRevised.description: Date value in ISO standard UTC date format. e.g. 2024-03-21 (YYYY-MM-DD)

dateTransmissionFileCreated.description: Date value in ISO standard UTC date format. e.g. 2024-03-21 (YYYY-MM-DD)

WarningCode.description:
A code to indicate the different types of errors.
11: Weight Note suffix is not numeric or has been omitted.
12: Number of bales is invalid or has been omitted.
13: Sale identification has been omitted.
18: Invalid Gross weight.
19: Invalid Tare weight.
20: Invalid Centre/Client code on pre-sale test request.
24: Incorrect PCTR Hash total.
DRVnn: Dark and Medullated Fibre Risk error where nn is the field number in error.

WoolTypeGroup.description:
A code to indicate which section of the sale that lot belongs.
MFLC: Merino fleece types
MSKT: Merino fleece types
XBFS: Merino fleece types
ODDS: Merino fleece types

Bearer.description: JWT Access Token that is added in the Authorization header of the HTTP request. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}". The JWT serves as a credential that proves the identity of the client to the server.
Bearer.name: Authorization

oauth2.description: Authentication for client applications by providing Client ID and Client Secret for an JWT Access Token.
